group_1.textLeft: But simply put, you are now at a crossroads.

group_1.textRight: …What do you mean…?

group_1.textLeft: It's time for you to choose whether you want@a new life or not!

group_1.textRight: I… A new life…

group_1.textLeft: Will you give your life to Cleopatra?
Or will you take it back for yourself,@for the sake of your future…?
Show me your resolve!
You said it yourself, didn't you?

group_1.textRight: I was born into the Met Clan!
Raised to be devoted to the pharaoh!
Fated to live and die with her!
What a rotten life…@Oh god…

group_1.textLeft: "What a rotten life…"
Is that what you want?
After blurting out those words...
...can you really say you're okay with@this awful way of being?

group_1.textRight: I…
Deep down, I pity that lady…
Successive offerings…@No, I should say Magical Girls…
All these wishes of Magical Girls who@contracted with the White Beast God…
In the past, we were asked to wish for the glory@of the dynasty.
That's how it was able to stay in power…
But things changed with Cleopatra.
Upon ascending the throne, she made requests@of our clan.
First for beauty…then for fluency in tongues…
Then to enrich the dynasty's treasury…@And to expand her cities…
So many of us were slain at the altar@of Cleopatra's reign…
*Chuckle* And I myself was prompted to wish@"For the glory of Queen Cleopatra"…
It seems she had made so many wishes that@she couldn't come up with anything else.
How very apt…
It was such a vague request that I had no idea@how to phrase it…
In the end, I could only say, "I wish for history@to know her glory forevermore!"

group_1.textLeft: But Cleopatra IS a significant figure@in our history.
In that sense, your wish seems to have@been granted.

group_1.textRight: I care not for what became of it…
Whatever the case, Cleopatra wielded@Magical Girls extensively.
She used my power…or rather, my magic.

group_1.textLeft: We got a real taste of it, but what exactly@does your power do?

group_1.textRight: Using the perfume from my censer, I can charm@and manipulate people at will.

group_1.textLeft: Hot damn…!
And you use it on the populace as well.

group_1.textRight: Indeed…mainly on those who would oppose@the dynasty.

group_1.textLeft: And that's how she keeps things in line…

group_1.textRight: And I fought Evil Gods…@[chara:104800:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:104800:cheek_0][chara:104800:face_mtn_ex_050.exp3.json][chara:104800:motion_400][chara:104800:lipSynch_1]Ah, erm…

group_1.textLeft: Witches.

group_1.textRight: Yes…I fought Witches as well.
I was told that if I failed to do so, I would be@unable to sustain myself.
Hence I worked tirelessly for Queen Cleopatra@at all hours…

group_1.textLeft: …That must have been really hard.

group_1.textRight: Yes…
In my heart, I knew the truth.
But although I didn't want to go on like this,
my clan had taught me no other way to live…
I couldn't imagine any alternatives…
And I pity Cleopatra as well…
In a way, I feared that by abandoning her,@since she herself is also a victim of magic,
I would be disavowing myself…

group_1.textLeft: That's not true!
Leaving her would not be disavowing yourself!
If anything, it'd be allowing you to return@to yourself!

group_1.textRight: …That's right…
…Here and now…
This is my crossroads…
